ValidationRule.description: Policy Type/Status Req'd at Proposal Received (Picklist)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct")) &&
AND(
ISBLANK(TEXT(Policy_Type_Status__c)),
OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Need To Submit"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Application Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Additional Info Needed"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Received"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Presented"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Approved / Closed Won")))
